name: Dread Intrusion
description:
Dread Intrusion.

Welcome to the add-on for "Game Under the Night Sky".
One night you fell asleep in your laboratory at the table. I was woken up by a strange noise that came from the room where you were experimenting with your friend...
Play as the Doctor who tried to catch you in the main game and save yourself from madness, if possible...

Don't forget complete Game Under the Night Sky: https://darius1168.itch.io/underthesky
